subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Tejay van Garderen of the United States climbed steadily after breaking from the pack and hung on to win the fourth stage of the Volta a Catalunya in Spain by three seconds, while Bart De Clercq of Belgium took the overall lead.
snippet: Tejay van Garderen of the United States climbed steadily after breaking from the pack and hung on to win the fourth stage of the Volta a Catalunya in Spain by three seconds, while Bart De Clercq of Belgium took the overall lead.
